comment: Smart Data Models - PssWECC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/PssWECC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Dual input Power System Stabilizer, based on IEEE type 2, with modified output limiter defined by WECC (Western Electricity Coordinating Council, USA).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: inputSignal1Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #1. Default: None

contents.name: inputSignal2Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #2. Default: None

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Input signal 1 gain  (K). Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Input signal 2 gain (K). Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Input signal 1 transducer time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t10
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Input signal 2 transducer time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Stabilizer washout time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Stabilizer washout time lag constant (T) (>0). Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t7
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t8
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: t9
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T). Default: 0

contents.name: vcl
contents.comment: Minimum value for voltage compensator output (V). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vcu
contents.comment: Maximum value for voltage compensator output (V). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmax
contents.comment: Maximum output signal (Vsmax). Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsmin
contents.comment: Minimum output signal (Vsmin). Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
